Serialized Form

  • Package view

    • Class view.TTTFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dimensions

          int dimensions
          The dimensions of the game board.

        • menuBar

          TTTMenuBar menuBar
          The menu bar in the UI.

        • panelList

          TTTPanel[] panelList
          The array of panels representing the game board onscreen.

        • currentSkin

          Skin currentSkin
          The skin to be used to paint TTTPanels.

    • Class view.TTTMenuBar extends javax.swing.JMenuBar implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • menuListener

          TTTMenuListener menuListener
          The TTTMenuListener handles ActionEvents fired by each JMenuItem. It seemed logical to have the TTTMenuBar report to its own listener instead of packing the code into the TTTController class, even though it does violate the model-view-controller theory on a small scale.

    • Class view.TTTPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • row

          int row
          The row and column for creation of a Location object corresponding to each individual TTTPanel in the TTTFrame.

        • col

          int col
          The row and column for creation of a Location object corresponding to each individual TTTPanel in the TTTFrame.

        • gridLocation

          Location gridLocation
          The Location corresponding to each TTTPanel in reference to the rest of the panels in the TTTFrame. Created based upon row and col.

        • skin

          Skin skin
          The Skin to be used on this TTTPanel.

        • currentImage

          java.awt.Image currentImage
          The current Image displayed on the TTTPanel.

        • player

          int player
          An int representing which image of the skin should be displayed on this TTTPanel, based on whose turn it is.
